transcription.speaker: Emily
transcription.text: Hi, can I speak to Bobby, please? Hi, this is Bobby. Yeah, hi, Bobby. Just want to let you know, the call is recorded. This is Emily calling from ICBC.

transcription.speaker: Emily
transcription.text: Umm yeah, I mean more massage after 12 weeks is is, you know really not required so just wanted to call you.

transcription.speaker: Bobby

transcription.text: I've already talked to somebody before like, I mean I was sitting around trying to get better and heal from that and I wasn't.
